text: Schneewittchen und die sieben Zwerge is an East German film. It was released in 1962. The picture sold 7,597,495 tickets.List of the 50 highest-grossing DEFA films. ==References== ==External links== * https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1343987/ Category:1962 films Category:1960s fantasy films Category:German fantasy films Category:German children's films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films based on Snow White Category:Films directed by Gottfried Kolditz
title: Snow White (1962 film)
